content: nataly scarf by edita __________________________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________________________ * size 122 cm x 60 cm + 7cm +60 cm 48 03 in x 23 62 in + 2 75 in +23 62 in * needles 3 mm us2 ½ /uk11 2 needles or circular needles * yarn 75 % wool 25 % polyamide 50 g = 205 m 224 yd / 4 play/fingering/sock yarn recommended yarn drops fabel needed 70 g * tapestry needle and scissors * gauge 24 sts x 32 row =10x 10cm/4 x 4 on abbreviations st/sts - stitch/es rs - right side ws - wrong side row row k - knit p - purl s slip wyb with yarn in back wyf with yarn in front yo - yarn over needle k2tog - knit 2 stitches together insert the right needle into 2 stitches at the same time and knit 1 st decrease bobble bind off - work instrukcions within parentheses as many times as directed 3x /4x etc - repeate three times /four times construction the scarf is a symmetrical triangle the first two edge stitches are knitted using the i-cord method as follows from the right side of the work pass 2 stitches with the yarn to the back from the wrong side of the work pass 2 stitches with the yarn to the front the edge stitches from the right and wrong side of the knitting are quickly transferred to the right needle to increase in every fourth row at the end of the work from the front we add one stitch yo in front of the last two stitches cast on 4 stitches with needle size 3 mm with long tile cast-on method and join worked back and front row and knit one row with a purl stitch row 1 rs wybs2 k2 row 2 ws wyfs2 p2 row 3 rs wybs2 k2 row 4 ws wyfs2 p2 increase in every fourth row at the end of the work from the front we add one stitch yo in front of the last two stitches row 5 rs wybs2 yo k2 row 6 ws wyfs2 p3 row 7 rs wybs2 k3 row 8 ws wyfs2 p3 row 9 rs wybs2 k1 yo k2 row 10 ws wyfs2 p4 row 11 rs wybs2 k4 row 12 ws wyfs2 p4 row 13 rs wybs2 k2 yo k2 row 14 ws wyfs2 p5 row 15 rs wybs2 k5 row 16 ws wyfs2 p5 row 17 rs wybs2 k3 yo k2 row 18 ws wyfs2 p6 row 19 rs wybs2 k6 row 20 ws wyfs2 p6 row 21 rs wybs2 k1 p1 2x yo k2 row 22 ws wyfs2 p1 k1 2x p3 row 23 rs wybs2 p5 k2 row 24 ws wyfs2 p7 row 25 rs wybs2 k1 p1 2x k1 yo k2 row 26 ws wyfs2 k1 p1 3x p2 row 27 rs wybs2 p6 k2 row 28 ws wyfs2 p8 row 29 rs wybs2 k1 p1 3x yo k2 row 30 ws wyfs2 p1 k1 3x
